article.title: Status and history for Nganasan
article.para: No known problem at this time.

history.history-entry: Replaced occurrences of U+00E7 รง LATIN SMALL LETTER C WITH CEDILLA with U+04AB ҫ CYRILLIC SMALL LETTER ES WITH DESCENDER.
stage 4: conversion to Unicode, thanks to Eric Muller.
stage 2: OHCHR identified as the source.
